question: T. S. Tirumurti, who was seen in news recently, has been appointed as the next Permanent Representative of India to which global organisation?
explanation:
Veteran Indian Foreign Service Officer T. S. Tirumurti has been appointed as the next Ambassador or Permanent Representative of India to the United Nations. 
The officer is currently serving as the Secretary (economic relations) in the Ministry of External Affairs. He replaces Sayyad Akbaruddin, who is superannuating this month. Prior to this appointment, Tirumurti has held several prime engagements and positions in Indiaâ€™s external affairs.
